short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utilizing SpecFlow to automate acceptance testing with the SpecBind extension, this utility creates pages faster and easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using SpecBind with SpecFlow and Selenium this utility allows you point and click to generate your Page and Elements classes.
